page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: The Hope Tavern is the only public house in the block & was built in 1856 by Thomas Dixon.Itis situated on the A46 where the railway crosses the main road.It is owned by Mr.& Mrs. Armitage.There is a friendly atmosphere.Pub food is served both at lunch time and in the evenings and there are facilities for bed and breakfast. Lysaghts social club is situated behind the Hope Tavern.There are many facilities including a snooker table,fruit machines and a licensed bar.Outside there is a bowling green,a cricket pitch,a football pitch and a miniature train which is used at the annual Gala.
